DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy tolerability methyl aminolevulinate 5-aminolevulinic acid photodynamic therapy patient moderate severe facial acne vulgaris randomize control investigator blind trial .
DOC.brief_title: Photodynamic Therapy Acne Vulgaris - Randomized Blinded Controlled Study
DOC.criteria: 18 year old , good health , 12 inflammatory facial acne lesion skin type VI , pregnant lactate woman . Oral retinoid use within one year , systemic antibiotic within 1 month , topical acne treatment within 2 week .
